main event: A witness observed a reddish-orange object in the sky that alternately faded and grew brighter for 35 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being 1/2 as bright as a Chicago Streetcar., The sighting occurred late at night and lasted for 35 minutes., The object was observed from ground level., There was a suggestion that the moon and a star might have been mistaken for the UFO., The report indicated that the object appeared stationary at times.
